law.catch_line: Criminal Record Review Board; Application Of Chapter
law.text: [Text of section added by 2010, 256, Sec. 56 effective May 4, 2012. See 2010, 256, Sec. 145 as amended by 2010, 359, Sec. 102.] The criminal record review board shall be subject to sections 1 to 8, inclusive, and shall not otherwise be subject to this chapter.
